Micro-Rings Hair Extension

This is when a series of nano rings are places closed to the scalp, by looping a small amount of hair through the bead, once this is done we apply the nano tip extension and squeeze down with pliers to ensure this is secure.

How does it work

The attachment method involves looping your natural hair though tiny rings and then connecting this with nano tip hair extensions, this is most suitable for clients with thin hair, as the nano tip is very discreet.

How long does it usually last

The application time usually takes up to 2 hours.


The hair typically lasts from around 12 months,however, with the right care, this can last longer
